text: 9.11-12 Stt 25.23 Pen ñɨ omɨŋal ma tɨkak won ak, kɨli gɨtep gep akaŋ gɨ tɨmel gep ak, anɨgɨl ma gel, God Lebeka nop agak, Ñɨ nad ned tɨkɨnɨgaban ak, ne ñɨ kɨdek ak muk okok mɨdɨl, wog nop gɨñɨnɨgab agak. Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, God gos ne ke nɨŋɨd pelpel gup ak, ne kɨdek gɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop aglup. Ne binbɨ wog gɨpal ak nɨŋɨd, kɨlop ma aglup. Gos ne ke nɨŋɨd, kɨlop suk agɨl aglup.
